item.title: Young-ISA Twitter Poster Conference (#YISAPoster2020)
item.description: Date: July 15-16th, 2020 Location: Twitter Time: 12.00pm WET Wednesday, July 15th 2020 - 12.00pm WET Thursday, July 16th 2020 The #YISAPoster2020 Twitter Conference will be held entirely online over Twitter and aims to provide an opportunity for Statistician and Data Scientist around the world to meet online, share thier research and engage in scientific debate. Join the #YISAPoster2020 event: Register: to submit a poster please register here.

item.title: Inaugural Young-ISA Meeting
item.description: Date: Friday October 4, 2019 Location: Glenroyal Hotel, Maynooth Time: 10.00 - 19.00 The full program is available here. The Young Statisticiansâ€™ Section of the Irish Statistical Association (Young-ISA) was formed in 2019 with the objectives of creating and cultivating a network of career-young statisticians across Ireland, supporting their professional development and providing a link to the Irish Statistical Association. This inaugural event will gather together early career statisticians from across Ireland for a series of talks on career development in academia and industry.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways. The emojify function can be called directly in templates or Inline Shortcodes.
